main.html: I study mathematics at the University of Waterloo in Canada. When not studying I'm usually asleep, and it's somewhere in between dreams and reality that I find the time to program. I've worked on several projects and have many more waiting in the backlog. I've also been blessed with the opportunity to write code for Tagged in San Francisco and Bazaarvoice in Austin.
